assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: This course provides an overview of the different types of algorithms and their design principles, as well as the key concepts in the analysis of their time and space complexity.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate eri tüüpi algoritmidest ja nende disaini printsiipidest, algoritmide teoreetilise hindamise (ajaline ja mahuline keerukus) alustest.

objectives.en: This course aims at introducing students to the main concepts and principles of algorithm and data structure design and analysis
objectives.et: Omandatakse peamised algoritmide ja andmestruktuuride disaini ja analüüsi printsiibid ja olulisemad eritüübilised algoritmid.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of this course, students should be able to:
- Choose appropriate algorithms and evaluate their suitability and performance for the given task.
learning_outcomes.et: - Valima algoritme ja hindama nende sobivust ja keerukust

learning_outcomes.en: - Implement algorithms and compare their efficiency
learning_outcomes.et: - Realiseerima algoritme ja võrdlema nende efektiivsust

learning_outcomes.en: - Understand the main theoretical principles of the algorithm analysis
learning_outcomes.et: - Aru saama erinevate andmestruktuuride ja algoritmide olemusest ja analüüsist
